title: NEST v3.7更新计划
body:
NEST Protocol is planning to update, the contents are as follows:

1. Change the post fee to dynamic, the formula is 0.01 eth + 600000 * gasPrice;

2. Adjust the fee of calling oracle to 0.001 eth each time.

NEST Protocol计划进行更新，内容如下：

1.  改为动态报价佣金，公式为0.01 eth + 600000*gasPrice；

2. 将预言机调用费调整为每次0.001 eth。
author: 0x48C56C8670d6EAe02F83089d0E60BbEc54F32841
